Shareholder Name: Ali Zaid Al Quraishi and Brothers
Saad Abdullah Al Tuwaijri Sons Holding Co
Adnan Ibrahim Al Hamoud Al Muhaisen

Description: Electrical Industries Co (known as: EIC) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since December 2014. EIC operates within the Capital Goods sector focusing on Electrical Components and Equipment. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Electrical Components and Equipment and Independent Power Producers and Energy Traders. EIC is based in Dammam, Saudi Arabia and was established in August 2007.
